But they are completely different.

Please stay out of this, Professor Ursula!

Very well then!
We just so happen to be getting a food shipment in tomorrow.
I order you to unload the trucks.
Moreover, you will take remedial lessons from Professor Ursula in the afternoon.
Am I clear, Professor Ursula?
I will clean the goblins' ears or wash the troll baths, anything!
You will not!
Tomorrow you are forbidden to leave, and that is final!
It is no good, her eyes are clouded over.
Anyway, what is so special about tomorrow?
There is going to be a new volume release event for night fall in the city tomorrow!
and falls though a mysterious portal to the past where she meets a handsome man named Edgar.

He is the most troubled and yet the most charming!

but she will finally reveal herself at tomorrow's event!
but tomorrow she will finally reveal herself at the event!
Okay, girls, we will be spending some time together for a fun lesson today.
Okay girls, today we will be spending some time together for a fun lesson.
The whole city is all about night fall!
The whole city is full of night fall!
And over there is the bagpiper who dies in battle in volume 220!
Is not that one of the 20 existing toothbrushes that came bundled with the magazine publication as a bonus 100 years ago?
Is not that one of the 20 existing toothbrushes that came as a bonus to the magazine publication 100 years ago?
Those worthless novels?
This crowd's bigger than I expected.
I found myself in the vampire clan that was despised by humans and got hooked.
I saw myself in the vampire clan that was despised by humans and got hooked.
But eventually I realized that the werewolf Arthur was only making passes at Belle to get Edgar's attention.
I am sure there must be many more people like me who felt saved after reading this.
the author Annabel will make her first public appearance ever!
Okay, Annabel!
Could you please give a word for your fans who have gathered here today?
Talk about aloof.
What is the new address of the company who made the gloves given to Belle by Grandma Hii?
The fastest person was that young lady in the red hood!
Of course she is.
She is right in front of her idol.
night fall was not written by just a single author.
I am the twelfth Annabel.
Her unpredictable twists are what makes night fall so irresistible.
I have to find her no matter what!
No, she is not anywhere.
What now?
Why are you looking so hard?
I just like to cheer on people like that.
But I will not accept that!
night fall's been getting more and more interesting each volume!
Everyone is been saying that the latest night fall books have jumped the shark.
Everyone says that the latest night fall books have been a train wreck.
The prison arc and the chapter when Belle caught a nuke with her bare hands
and the saga when everyone aimed to be a cappella world champions were all really interesting!
Same for me.
I think there are kids like that all over the world.
I am the same way.
There are probably kids like that all over the world.
I am serious!
The costume Lotte was talking to entered the leyline ahead of us!
I am serious!
The costumer Lotte was talking to went into the leyline ahead of us!
It must be a Luna Nova student!
They must be a student at Luna Nova!
Oh, it is a message from GreatBen810.
Are you going to the release event?
Absolutely, I would not miss it.
What about you, GreatBen810?
Whoa, that was fast!
I am going to make it, no matter what.
This is the first chance we have ever gotten to meet Annabel.
I know, right?
I wish it was Saturday already!
You three again?
It was condemnable of you to sneak into the kitchen and pilfer a pie!
Not to mention you wolfed the entire thing down in a single night!
Are you not ashamed as students of Luna Nova?!
That is why I told you to take something less conspicuous.
It was not a pie.
Excuse me?
We did not take a pie.
It was a tart!
Wait, Akko!
But they are totally different things.
Exactly, they are entirely separate.
These children stole a tart, not a pie!
Tarts are three times as expensive as pies!
Professor Badcock, there is no need to bring up the price with the students...
Please keep your mouth shut, Professor Ursula.
In the first place, you eat far too much already!
Luna Nova has enough financial issues as it is, yet you eat through the food budget like fools!
We are only hungry because you are so stingy with the budget!
Today's menu was potato salad, mashed potatoes, and French friesthree kinds of potato dishes!
How can you not be satiated after eating so many potatoes?
Potatoes get digested too quickly!
That is quite enough.
Not only did you steal a pie, but you back-talked a teacher.
Very well, then!
We just so happen to be receiving a food shipment tomorrow.
You are to unload the trucks.
You are also to take remedial lessons with Professor Ursula in the afternoon.
Am I understood, Professor Ursula?
Y-Yes!
Wait, wait, wait!
I cannot do that!
Please make our punishment something else!
I have to go to the city tomorrow!
Lotte?
I will do anything else you want!
I will clean the goblins' ears or wash the troll bathsanything!
Look, even Akko is repenting!
Just look at her!
I promise to be good!
I will even massage your shoulders!
What is gotten into you, Lotte?
I beg of you, let me to go the city tomorrow!
Please, please, please!
Absolutely not!
You are categorically forbidden to leave tomorrow!

kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
What is wrong with Lotte?
Who knows.
No good, her eyes are all clouded over.
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
Anyways, what is so special about tomorrow?
You do not know?
There is a release event for the new night fall volume in the city tomorrow!
Look!
That is too close.
night fall?
Yes, night fall!
Heard of it?
The title, at least.
night fall is a series of novels that have been a huge hit all around the world!
Belle, a high school science teacher who got cold feet just before her wedding, visits a manor house
and falls though a mysterious portal to the past, where she meets a handsome man named Edgar.
But then she finds out Edgar is a vampire!
Belle is thrust into a tempest that shakes the very foundations of history!
It is a story of love,
adventure,
thrills,
conspiracy,
friendship,
and youth!
It is a literary epic encompassing every genre imaginable and presented as a historic fiction novel for girls!
Up until now, there have been 364 volumes.
And tomorrow, the memorable 365th novel is finally being released!
By the way, my favorite character is Edgar's rival, the werewolf Arthur.
No one is more troubled and charming than him!
Get it?
Y-Yeah.
Is not night fall's author constantly getting trolled on the internet?
Yes!
The author, Annabel Creme, is a witch who is been writing the series for 120 years.
She is never shown her face in public before,
but she will finally reveal herself at tomorrow's event!
Wow, sounds cool.
They will be selling original goods at the event, and all the fans are going to dress up in costume!
But I cannot go...
It is all over.
All of it.
It is... over...
Now she is lost it.
She is not taking this well.
I feel horrible for Lotte.
And you are the one to blame.
Huh?
It is my fault?
If you had not stolen that tart, Lotte would have been able to go to the city.
I have got it!
Looks like I will not be able to make it.
Guess I will check out Annabel's MyStage.
Maybe she is posted something about tomorrow.
There they go again.
Aw man, I wish I could go see Annabel in person, even if only for a second.
Lotte!
I just came up with the best plan ever!
It is all potatoes again...
Heavy.
That is the last of them.
And we are finished.
Okay, let us do this.
Right.
Thanks for your help.
Sure, and goodbye!
Okay, now!
Hannah and Barbara, yes?
Make sure to be back by six.
Hitching a ride will get us right to the city.
I am a genius!
What is it?
I forgot about Professor Ursula's lesson!
Akko, you cannot make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.
Sacrifices are a necessary evil.
You heard her.
Well, it will work out somehow.
Okay girls, we will be spending some time together for a fun lesson today.
Huh?
Akko!
Akko!
We are almost past the city.
Crap!
Oh, Lotte, you are in cosplay!
What do you think?
It looks great!
All right, let us go.
It is the city!
And now we are back on foot.
The magic dies off quickly once we leave school grounds.
It is amazing!
All the city streets are filled with night fall!
It is like a dream!
Look at that!
Over there!
It is the pirate waiter from volume 158!
And over there is the bagpiper who dies in battle in volume 220!
That is the old loan shark who only shows up for one line in volume 37!
Is not that one of the 20 existing toothbrushes that came bundled with the magazine version as a bonus 100 years ago?
I will buy it for any amount you wish!
Go on, name your price!
What the heck?
Hey, excuse me!
Lotte?
You are... amazing!
Are not you Great Ben, the clock tower Belle lived in at the very beginning of her journey?
I can trust anyone with a costume like yours with my life!
You are the first person to recognize me.
Of course I would, it is common knowledge!
Let us be friends!
Silly girl, we are already friends.
What the heck?
What is going on around here?
I think this is an event for night fall.
That worthless drivel?
How stupid must you be to dress up like that as an adult?
Hey, why do not we stick around just to see how stupid they are for ourselves?
Huh?
Is not that it?
Lotte, it is over there!
I made it...
Thank you, girls!
This place is packed!
The crowd's bigger than I expected.
What made you become a fan of night fall, Lotte?
It happened back when I was a child.
My family ran a small magic item shop.
One day, some of the local kids started teasing me because I was a witch.
That was when I first encountered night fall at the library.
I found a reflection of myself in the vampire clan that was despised by humans and got hooked.
But I realized eventually that the werewolf Arthur was only making passes at Belle to get Edgar's attention.
I just could not get that out of my mind.
Before I realized it, my own worries seemed trivial in comparison.
I am sure there must be many more people like me who felt like they were saved after reading this.
Sorry, could not really catch that!
Say it again?
To commemorate the release of night fall's 365th volume,
the author Annabel will make her first-ever public appearance!
Please give it up for Annabel Creme!
What?!
She is the writer?
Is not she too young, even for a witch?
She is not just young, she is a kid.
Is she using magic to look like that?
So cute...
Well then, Annabel!
Can we have a word from you for your fans who have gathered here today?
What?
A word for your fans!
Hello.
Anything else?
You are the one who asked for a word.
So cold...
What a cheeky brat.
So cute...
A-Anyway, let us move on to our next segment.
The night fall quiz show!
Every question was personally made by Annabel to test your limits!
Whoever manages to take first place will be awarded a fabulous prize from Annabel herself!
Question one!
This one's a softball.
What is the new address of the company that made the gloves given to Belle by Grandma Hii?
Huh?
You know this, Barbara?
Uh, no!
I was just stretching my arm...
The fastest person was that red-hooded young lady!
North Grampianshire, 43-5 White Street!
Correct!
Lotte, wow!
Let us keep on going!
Count Edward M. Winter!
Area code!
Hexamine, potassium nitrate, and aqueous hydrogen peroxide.
79 years and 2 months old.
We are finally down to our last two contestants.
Which of them will claim victory?
Hey, do you happen to be GreatBen810?
I cannot believe she made it to the end.
Lotte, you can do it!
Lotte?
Ah, that is Lotte!
Akko and Sucy are here too.
Lotte!
Do your best!
Now then, time for our final question.
Annabel Creme's mother learned piano from a certain teacher as a child.
Her husband's father's favorite bakery is named...
Somerset Bakery!
Was that really in there?
What volume was it written in?
Lotte...
Looks like even Lotte's stumped by this one.
I do not think it is a rose...
Not a narcissus either...
Hydrangea...
Hydrangea!
That is correct!
She got it!
We have our lucky winner!
Please step forward.
She is all tensed up.
Of course she would be!
I mean, she is right in front of her idol.
Annabel's present is her favorite fountain pen!
You must really love night fall.
Yes, of course!
Then you will gladly accept this.
You are the next Annabel.
Huh?
night fall was not written by just one single author.
I am the twelfth Annabel.
Now that you have accepted it, you are the thirteenth.
If you do not write, then your beloved night fall ends today.
It looks like she is disappeared.
What a staple of Annabel Creme.
It is these unpredictable twists that make night fall so irresistible!
A round of applause!
And that is all the time we have!
Huh?
Did not that seem kind of sudden?
Pretty unnatural.
Man, she really got me there.
A magic item for teleportation...
I had no idea what to do after she vanished.
Hey, wait up!
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
I cannot find her anywhere.
Think she is outside?
Lotte!
What happened?
Annabel disappearing was not part of the show.
It looks like she used this.
What is it?
A magic item.
Though it is more like a toy anyone could use.
That is right, Annabel is not a witch!
What?
I absolutely have to find her!
Please help me look!
Got it.
Annabel?
Annabel!
Annabel?
Annabel!
I cannot find Annabel!
Mushroom.
Annabel!
Annabel, where are you?
Mushroom.
Find her?
No, she was not anywhere I looked.
What now?
Why do you need to find her so bad?
To tell you the truth, night fall was not written by a single author.
It was written by generations of people who inherited this fountain pen.
You mean the fountain pen Annabel just gave to you?
Yes.
Then that means you are going to be the next writer of night fall?
If I cannot return it, then yeah.
That is great, Lotte!
What?
It means Annabel passed the torch to you!
Well, I guess...
You will get to write your favorite story yourself!
Your dream is about to come true!
But I never asked for that.
I cannot believe that.
You love night fall so much!
I told you that is not it!
What do you mean?
I understand why you want to be like Chariot,
but I have never wanted to be like Annabel.
I do not want to do the same thing the person I look up to does.
She can do things that I cannot.
I just enjoy cheering on people like that.
Lotte...
That is why I need to find Annabel as soon as possible.
Hey, is that fountain pen really old?
Yeah, I heard that it is been used to write ever since the first chapter.
If it is that old, do not you think it should have a faerie?
What do you mean?
Lotte can talk to the faeries of old items.
Whoa!
That is amazing!
You are too surprised.
Faeries dwell within old things.
I learned how to do it as a kid from my witch grandma.
But I am not sure if it is possible here.
Let us go somewhere else.
It is nice to meet you.
My name is Lotte Jansson.
I would like to know where Annabel is.
I cannot hear anything.
Just wait.
Got it.
Thank you.
What did it say?
Unfortunately, it does not know.
Oh...
But listen, it said that this fountain pen chooses each successive writer of night fall.
The current Annabel was chosen by this pen too.
But it seems that she is not confident in her own abilities.
She only held today's event to look for a successor herself.
And she ended up choosing you.
But I will not accept that!
night fall's only been getting more interesting by the volume!
That means that the current Annabel's stories are amazing!
I will never accept a night fall written by anyone except her!
Lotte, let us go tell her that!
Huh?
There is no way Annabel could quit writing after hearing that from you!
Akko...
Considering how much you love Annabel, you should be able to figure out where she would go.
Where Annabel would go?
Yeah, yeah!
Places she likes!
Um, well, things she likes...
Hydrangeas?
There is a bunch blooming over there.
She is close!
It is all the same.
Guess I should head home now...
Do not run!
E-Even if you beg, I will not take it back!
That fountain pen belongs to you now!
No, you should be the one to have it.
It chose you for your talent.
I am not talented at all!
Everyone is been saying that the latest night fall books have been a train wreck.
It is true that I never expected Arthur to go to space...
See?!
I was surprised, but he is been unconsciously wanting to go to space for the longest time.
It is just like when his Oedipus complex was revealed in the past.
Experts have been predicting this for ages!
It is something every fan knows!
We have always been waiting for this development!
But that is just what a small part of the fanbase thinks.
Ever since I started writing, I have been flamed like crazy.
Now that is only a small part of the fanbase.
The prison arc, the chapter when Belle caught a nuke with her bare hands,
and the saga of them aiming for the a capella world championship were all really interesting!
It is like, how could you possibly not enjoy all that?!
Even I wrote those because I thought they were interesting.
But how am I supposed to stand back up when they say stop writing and this sucks and call each new volume worthless?
I have had enough.
What is your favorite book?
Which book do you like the most?
Volume 363 when
The one where Edgar lends Arthur his shoehorn?
Yeah!
I knew I wanted to write that one since I started!
Edgar hands over the shoehorn with his left hand, right?
His clan believes that the left hand is a symbol of life.
And he handed him the shoehorn he received from his father with his left hand!
That means
You are right!
I never realized!
What does it mean?
No idea.
You really are a prodigy if you can write that subconsciously.
I grew up reading night fall, so I really love it.
It was the same for me.
I think there are kids like that all over the world.
But you are the only one who loves it more than anyone and also has the ability to add to it.
If you stopped writing, then the real night fall would be gone forever.
Only you can write the night fall of our time.
Only you can be Annabel.
Yeah.
I really do want to write!
Thanks!
night fall?
I swear I saw her!
You are crazy.
I am serious!
The cosplayer Lotte was talking to entered the leyline ahead of us!
They must be a Luna Nova student!
I presume you are prepared.
Yes...
I got a handshake from Annabel, but now I am getting all covered in troll grime.
It is not like you were even her fan before.
Who cares if I am a secondary?
But really, you can find all sorts of people in this world.
I learned a lot today.
Talking about Annabel?
Did not I tell you she was amazing?
I mean you!
You do not want to be like the person you admire, you want to support them.
I have never considered that before.
Though I still think you missed a big opportunity.
You are still saying that?
Still, I am glad it ended well, Lotte.
Yeah, I am really glad.
I would be spoiled on the story if I wrote it myself, so there would be nothing to look forward to.
Huh?
Was that your actual reason?
That is just how it goes.
Let us hurry up and finish cleaning already.
GreatBen810, are not you excited for the next release?
Should I start reading?
Nah.
I will save it until later.
Good night.
